 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָלַם‎</span>] **verb** ==bind== (perhaps compare Assyrian [<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***al¹mu***</u></abbr>], <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***almattu***</u></abbr>, ***fortress*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]] in [[BDB#Zim|Zim]]<sup>BP 114</sup> &amp; in [[BDB#BD|BD]]<sup>Ezek.:xi</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be in pain***, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***retain*** anger). **Niph\`al** (***be bound*** =) be dumb, ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶאֱלָ֑מָה‎</span> [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנֶאֱלַמְתָּ֫‎</span> [[Ezek.3.26|Ezek 3:26]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּאָלֵם‎</span> [[Ezek.24.27|Ezek 24:27]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּאָלַמְנָה‎</span> [[Ps.31.19|Ps 31:19]]. — 

**1.** ***be dumb***, i.e. silent [[Ps.39.3|Ps 39:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דוּמִיָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶחֱשֵׁיתִי‎</span>); compare v[[Ps.39.10|Ps 39:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא אֶפְתַּחפִּֿי‎</span>); simile of sheep [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] (\|\| ***id.***); ***be dumb***, i.e. unable to speak [[Ezek.3.26|Ezek 3:26]] (result of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּלְשׁוֺנְךָ אַדְבִּיק אֶלחִֿכָּ֑ךָ‎</span>) compare [[Ezek.24.27|Ezek 24:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפָּתַח פִּיךָ ֗֗֗ ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְדַבֵּר וְלֹא תֵאָלֵם עוֺד‎</span>; [[Ezek.33.22|Ezek 33:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּפְתַּח פִּי וְלֹא נֶאֱלַמְתִּי עוֺד‎</span>; also [[Dan.10.15|Dan 10:15]] (compare v[[Dan.10.16|Dan 10:16]]); ***be made dumb*** subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂפְתֵי שָׁ֑קֶר‎</span> ***lying lips*** [[Ps.31.19|Ps 31:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדְּמוּ לִשְׁאוֺל‎</span> v[[Ps.31.18|Ps 31:18]]). **Pi\`el** ***Participle bind*** [[Gen.37.7|Gen 37:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאַלְּמִים אֲלֻמִּים‎</span> ***binding sheaves***.
